name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixing YouTube Videos on the web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is fixed YouTube Videos on the web(PC) and in default mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you use the web version of YouTube, you can't see the video when you scroll in the Y axis, right?
If you want to watch the video while reading the comments, this product will fix the video to the top when you scroll.
